meanings.definition: The quality or state of being reserved or modest in behavior.
meanings.sent1: Her demureness in social settings made her stand out as a polite and respectful individual.
meanings.sent2: She displayed demureness by avoiding drawing attention to herself during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: Despite her demureness, she managed to make everyone laugh with her witty comments.
meanings.sent4: The demureness of the old library whispered tales of ancient knowledge and wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The demureness of the painting captured the essence of simplicity and elegance.

meanings.definition: The act of behaving in a shy or modest manner.
meanings.sent1: His demureness at the party made him seem approachable and kind.
meanings.sent2: The actress's demureness on stage charmed the audience and won their hearts.
meanings.sent3: Despite her demureness, she managed to steal the spotlight with her graceful dance moves.
meanings.sent4: The demureness of the kitten as it approached the unfamiliar object was endearing.
meanings.sent5: Her demureness in the face of adversity showed her inner strength and resilience.
